name: Who Killed Ned
description:
****** PLS READ******

I had a major glitch and the game made it to the finish line in a very sorry state. Only the first couple of puzzles work and I had to take 80% of the content out to cross the finish line... i'll publish a more complete version in a couple of days once the jam is over. ********

Ned is dead, I'm sad to say.

We suspect it was foul play.

Who killed him? Was it Mr. Brown?

Did Ms. Snow strike him down?

Find the clues, read the text

Or you might find that you are next.

* * * * * * 

Read clues and solve the puzzle by finding the missing piece in a concentration-style game.
